title: Man charged for posting YouTube threats to kill Trump, ICE agents
shortDescription: Federal prosecutors said that Shawn Monper used the YouTube account "Mr Satan" to post comments on several videos, threatening officials.

title: Trump says he took cognitive test during annual physical
shortDescription: Trump said the results of his annual physical exam will be released Sunday. He said he took a cognitive test and "got every answer right."

title: Trump gives military control of federal land at southern border
shortDescription: President Donald Trump issued a memorandum Friday giving the U.S. military jurisdiction over federal lands at the southern border.

title: Exclusive: Trump budget proposal would eliminate Head Start funding
shortDescription: The White House's budget proposes eliminating Head Start, an early childhood education program that provides services to low-income families.

title: 19 state AGs ask judge to block Trump student-visa revocations
shortDescription: The Trump administration argues some international students have improperly participated in pro-Palestinian protests.

title: White House replaces Obama portrait with Trump fist-pump artwork
shortDescription: The artwork appears to be based on an iconic Associated Press photo.

title: Head of Greenland base Vance visited is fired after criticizing Trump
shortDescription: "Actions to undermine the chain of command or to subvert President Trump's agenda will not be tolerated at the Department of Defense," the Pentagon said.

title: Congress members’ flight clips wing
shortDescription: Two regional jets clipped their wings on the Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport tarmac. At least seven lawmakers were on board.

title: Senate confirms Trump pick Dan Caine as top US military officer
shortDescription: The Senate voted 60 to 25 to confirm Dan Caine on Friday as chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, two months after Trump fired his predecessor.

title: Daily Briefing: The GOP looks for trillions
shortDescription: Republicans begin to envision new tax and spending cuts. Here is the news to know on Friday.

title: US Army turns over helicopter safety memo to Congress
shortDescription: The U.S. Army has turned over to the Senate a 2024 Augustmemo detailing why it routinely failed to use a safety system known as ADS-B on helicopter flights around Reagan Washington National Airport, Senator Ted Cruz said.

title: Congress has kickstarted work on Trump's agenda: What to know
shortDescription: House Republicans can expect plenty of fights ahead on taxes, spending cuts and more.

title: China hits back at Trump tariff hike, raises duties on US goods to 125%
shortDescription: Beijing on Friday increased its tariffs on U.S. imports to 125%, hitting back against President Donald Trump's decision to hike duties on Chinese goods to 145%.

title: Timeframe for Trump's 'gold card' for the world's wealthy revealed
shortDescription: Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said Thursday the $5 million visa, would be available within a “week, week-and-a-half.”

title: Trump Administration cancels student visas
shortDescription: The Trump administration has cited reasons like roommate disputes and traffic tickets for canceling hundreds of international student visas.
